services.title: SERVICES
services.heading: Your project journey with us in 4 steps

step1.title: Free communication and consultation
step1.description: Analyze your needs over a short call and determine the appropriate type of cutting or perforation.

step2.title: Clear same-day pricing
step2.description: Receive transparent and competitive pricing on the same day, with no hidden fees or surprises.

step3.title: Accurate field implementation
step3.description: Our expert team executes your project with precision and attention to detail on-site.

step4.title: Delivery and documented reports
step4.description: Get comprehensive documentation and reports delivered promptly after project completion.

items.question: How can I register for the Akron Tech Summit?
items.answer: You can register through our online portal or contact us directly.

items.question: Will the summit be available online for remote attendees?
items.answer: Yes, we offer both in-person and online attendance options.

items.question: What is the dress code for the event?
items.answer: Business casual attire is recommended for all attendees.

items.question: Can I submit my project or research for the summit?
items.answer: Yes, we welcome project and research submissions. Please contact us for details.

items.question: How can I become a sponsor or exhibitor at the event?
items.answer: Please reach out to our sponsorship team through the contact page.

items.question: Will there be opportunities for networking at the summit?
items.answer: Absolutely! We have dedicated networking sessions and social events.

contact.contactInfoDescription: We're here to help you with all your concrete cutting and construction needs. Reach out to us through any of the following channels.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: Welcome to ALMOHTAREF. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our concrete cutting and drilling services. By engaging our services, you agree to be bound by these terms. Please read them carefully.

section2.title: 2. Services
section2.content: We provide professional concrete cutting, drilling, and related construction services in Mecca, Jeddah, and Taif. Our services include but are not limited to:

section3.title: 3. Service Availability
section3.content: We operate 24/7 and provide emergency services. However, service availability may be subject to weather conditions, site accessibility, and other factors beyond our control. We will inform you of any delays or limitations as soon as possible.

section4.title: 4. Pricing and Payment
section4.content: All pricing is provided on a case-by-case basis after consultation. We provide transparent, same-day pricing with no hidden fees. Payment terms will be agreed upon before work commences. We accept various payment methods as discussed during consultation.

section5.title: 5. Site Access and Safety
section5.content: The client is responsible for ensuring safe and accessible site conditions. We require proper site access, adequate lighting, and compliance with all safety regulations. Any additional costs due to site conditions or delays will be communicated and agreed upon beforehand.

section6.title: 6. Liability and Insurance
section6.content: We carry appropriate insurance coverage for our operations. However, clients are responsible for ensuring their property is adequately insured. We are not liable for damage to existing structures beyond our control or due to pre-existing conditions.

section7.title: 7. Warranty and Guarantees
section7.content: We guarantee professional workmanship and quality materials. Any defects in our work will be rectified at no additional cost, provided they are reported within 30 days of completion and are due to our workmanship.

section8.title: 8. Changes and Cancellations
section8.content: Changes to the scope of work must be agreed upon in writing. Cancellations made less than 24 hours before scheduled work may incur charges for preparation and mobilization costs already incurred.

contact.title: Questions About Our Terms?
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

projects.description: Each project represents our commitment to precision, quality, and professional excellence. From commercial complexes to residential renovations, we deliver cutting-edge solutions that meet the highest standards.
projects.noProjectsFound: No projects found in this category.

fullServices.learnAboutServices: Learn about our services or contact us through the contact page.

services.description: Drilling concrete with core holes (up to 50 cm in diameter).
services.alt: Technician performing concrete core drilling service

services.description: Cutting reinforced concrete with a diamond saw (for all thicknesses).
services.alt: Diamond saw cutting reinforced concrete slab

services.description: Cutting thick concrete using diamond wire technology.
services.alt: Specialists operating diamond wire cutting equipment

services.description: Repairing cracks caused by perforation using epoxy injection
services.alt: Epoxy injection repairing cracks in concrete wall

services.description: Deliberate demolition of buildings while preserving the concrete structure
services.alt: Planned demolition work at a concrete structure

stories.title: Residential tower in Jeddah
stories.subtitle: Providing 36 working hours
stories.challenge: Implementing 28 extension openings on occupied floors.
stories.solution: Divide the work into night shifts with an integrated dust extraction system.
stories.result: The work was completed without any complaints from the residents and with the finishes fully preserved.

stories.title: Hospital in Mecca
stories.subtitle: Zero suspension of services
stories.challenge: Cutting openings in operating rooms without affecting sensitive equipment.
stories.solution: Use water saws with complete wrapping of the work area and water recycling.
stories.result: Project delivered ahead of schedule with a calibration report for the medical devices

stories.title: Factory in Medina
stories.subtitle: 100% commitment to safety
stories.challenge: Removing heavy concrete foundations within an active production line
stories.solution: A specialized team using diamond wire technology with a segmented dismantling plan.
stories.result: The line was restarted on the same day without any injuries or losses.

servicesPage.heroDescription: Professional services that fit your needs. We deliver excellence in every project, combining expertise with cutting-edge technology to bring your vision to life.

testimonialsList.quote: Exceptional service and professional team. They delivered exactly what we needed on time and within budget.

testimonialsList.quote: The quality of work exceeded our expectations. Highly recommend their services for any concrete project.

testimonialsList.quote: Professional, reliable, and cost-effective. Best choice for concrete services in the region.

hero.subtitle: Our Story
hero.title: Building Excellence,
hero.description: For over a decade, Almohtaref has been the trusted partner for precision concrete cutting, demolition, and specialized construction services across Mecca, Jeddah, and Taif.

whoWeAre.subtitle: Who We Are
whoWeAre.title: Specialized Service for Opening Doors and Windows
whoWeAre.paragraph1: Almohtaref is a leading provider of specialized construction services, specializing in precision concrete cutting, door and window openings, plumbing and electrical installations, and controlled demolition.
whoWeAre.paragraph2: Our team of experienced professionals combines cutting-edge technology with traditional craftsmanship to deliver exceptional results that exceed our clients' expectations.
whoWeAre.paragraph3: We understand that every project is unique, which is why we approach each job with careful planning, attention to detail, and a commitment to excellence.

images.doorWindowOpening: Specialized door and window opening service
images.plumbingElectrical: Precise plumbing and electrical installation work
images.concreteCutting: Professional concrete cutting and demolition service

timeline.subtitle: Our Journey
timeline.title: Milestones & Achievements
timeline.description: A decade of growth, innovation, and excellence in construction services

milestones.title: Foundation
milestones.description: Almohtaref was established with a vision to revolutionize concrete cutting and demolition services in Saudi Arabia.

milestones.title: Expansion
milestones.description: Expanded operations to serve Jeddah and Taif, establishing ourselves as a trusted regional service provider.

milestones.title: Innovation
milestones.description: Introduced advanced precision cutting technology, enabling us to handle complex projects with minimal disruption.

milestones.title: Recognition
milestones.description: Recognized as a leading service provider in Mecca, with over 500 successful projects completed.

milestones.title: Excellence
milestones.description: Achieved 24-hour service guarantee, setting new industry standards for response time and quality.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To deliver exceptional precision cutting and construction services that exceed client expectations, while maintaining the highest standards of safety, quality, and professionalism. We are committed to being the most reliable and trusted partner in the construction industry.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leading provider of specialized construction services in Saudi Arabia, recognized for innovation, excellence, and unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction. We envision a future where precision and reliability set the standard for the entire industry.

coreValues.subtitle: Why Choose Us
coreValues.title: Our Core Values
coreValues.description: The principles that guide everything we do

values.title: Precision
values.description: We deliver exact cuts and precise workmanship, ensuring minimal waste and maximum efficiency.

values.title: Reliability
values.description: 24-hour availability means we're always ready when you need us, delivering on time, every time.

values.title: Quality
values.description: We use only the finest equipment and maintain the highest standards in every project we undertake.

values.title: Expertise
values.description: Our skilled team brings years of experience and continuous training to every project.

reviews.subtitle: Client Reviews
reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.description: Selections from our trusted clients' opinions in projects across Jeddah, Mecca, and Taif

testimonials.text: The best team I've worked with for concrete cutting. They adhered to safety and deadlines 100%. Highly professional and reliable service.
testimonials.author: Eng. Sarah Al-Harbi

testimonials.text: Air conditioner openings were completed without any cracks, and delivery was within less than 12 hours. I highly recommend them.
testimonials.author: Mohammed Al-Otaibi

testimonials.text: Outstanding precision work on our demolition project. The team was punctual, professional, and the cleanup was impeccable.
testimonials.author: Ahmed Al-Zahrani
